name: Formula One Group
description: Formula One Group is a global leader in the motorsports industry, known primarily for organizing and promoting the FIA Formula One World Championship. Established in 1950, the company has transformed into a significant entertainment brand, attracting millions of fans worldwide. Formula One Group oversees the commercial rights of the sport, including race promotion, broadcast rights, and digital media. The organization is committed to enhancing the fan experience through innovative technologies, including immersive virtual experiences and advanced data analytics. With a rich history of high-speed racing and iconic teams, Formula One continues to evolve, focusing on sustainability and technological advancement within the sport. In recent years, the company has taken significant strides towards reducing its carbon footprint by promoting hybrid technology and exploring renewable energy solutions. Through its extensive global reach, Formula One Group fosters partnerships with various sponsors and stakeholders, delivering unparalleled entertainment while engaging audiences across diverse platforms.

seo.meta_title: Formula One Group | Formula 1 Racing and Entertainment
seo.meta_description: Explore Formula One Group, the organizer of the FIA Formula One World Championship. Discover the latest news, races, and the future of motorsports.

faq.question: What is Formula One known for?
faq.answer: Formula One is known for organizing the FIA Formula One World Championship and hosting high-speed racing events worldwide.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Formula One?
faq.answer: Stefano Domenicali is the CEO of Formula One Group.

faq.question: Where is Formula One headquartered?
faq.answer: Formula One is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What types of products does Formula One offer?
faq.answer: Formula One offers various racing events and media rights for broadcasting and digital content.
